description: An object representing an execution of Payment to PayPal to capture the funds and credit your Linode Account.

payer_id.description: The PayerID returned by PayPal during the transaction authorization process.

payment_id.description: The PaymentID returned from [Stage a PayPal payment](https://techdocs.akamai.com/linode-api/reference/post-pay-pal-payment) that has been approved with PayPal.
